    • Method Detail

      • disableIntercept

        public void disableIntercept()
        Disables the fitting of the y-intercept for this fit.

      • fit

        public org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealVector fit(org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealVector indVarValues,
                                             org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealVector depVarValues)
        Performs a robust least squares fit with bisquare weights to the supplied data.
        Parameters:
        indVarValues - A RealVector containing the values of the independent variable.
        depVarValues - A RealVector containing the values of the dependent variable.
        Returns:
        a RealVector containing two elements: the slope of the fit and the y-intercept of the fit.

      • wlsFit

        public org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealVector wlsFit(org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealVector indVarValues,
                                                org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealVector depVarValues,
                                                org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealVector weights)
        Performs a weighted least squares fit with supplied weights to the supplied data.
        Parameters:
        indVarValues - A RealVector containing the values of the independent variable.
        depVarValues - A RealVector containing the values of the dependent variable.
        weights - A RealVector containing the weights for the data points.
        Returns:
        a RealVector containing two elements: the slope of the fit and the y-intercept of the fit.

      • calculateLeverages

        protected org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealVector calculateLeverages(org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealVector indVarValues)
        Calculates the leverages of data points for least squares fitting (assuming equal variances).
        Parameters:
        indVarValues - The values of the independent variable used for the fitting.
        Returns:
        a RealVector containing a leverage value for each independent variable value.

      • calculateStandardizedAdjustedResiduals

        protected org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealVector calculateStandardizedAdjustedResiduals(org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealVector indVarValues,
                                                                                org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealVector depVarValues,
                                                                                org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealVector leverages,
                                                                                org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealVector fitParams)
        Calculates the standardized adjusted residuals (according to the same definition used by MATLAB) of the data points for fitting.
        Parameters:
        indVarValues - The values of the independent variable used for the fitting.
        depVarValues - The values of the dependent variable used for the fitting.
        leverages - the leverages of the independent variables, as compted by calculateLeverages(RealVector)
        fitParams - the results of a (possibly weighted) least squares fit to the data, containing one or two components: a slope and an optional y-intercept.
        Returns:
        a RealVector containing an adjusted residual value for each data point

      • calculateBisquareWeights

        protected org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealVector calculateBisquareWeights(org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealVector stdAdjR)
        Calculates the weight for the next weighted least squares iteration using the bisquare weighting function.
        Parameters:
        stdAdjR - the standardized adjusted residuals, as computed by calculateStandardizedAdjustedResiduals(RealVector, RealVector, RealVector, RealVector)
        Returns:
        a RealVector containing weights for each data point suitable for weighted least squares fitting.
